name: The Hubris of Icarus
description:
Icarus thought he could avoid the rays of sunlight and fly forever. How far will you fly?

Controls: Up & Down arrow keys 

Note: If you're experiencing technical difficulty, please try clicking on the game with your cursor or clicking the blue full-screen button in the bottom-right corner. 

(Special thanks to Hooson on Youtube for the tutorial for this type of game!)
